events.message: I have just filed a claim for a car accident that occurred yesterday evening involving another vehicle on the highway.
The submitted claim has been categorized under ‘Auto Accident’ as it involves a collision between two cars.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle your auto accident claim going forward.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim and assure you we are prioritizing your case for a quick resolution.
Please provide the police report and photos of the vehicle damage to proceed further with your auto accident claim.
All requested documents including the police report and vehicle photos have been submitted successfully for review.
The claims investigation team has commenced a detailed review of your car accident claim and related documents.
The investigation into your auto accident claim has been completed; assessment reports are now available.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on damages sustained in the collision and policy coverage.
We have received your feedback expressing satisfaction with the settlement terms offered for your auto accident.
Your auto accident claim has been officially approved; payment processing is now underway.
The agreed settlement payment has been issued and should reflect in your bank account within 2 business days.
Your auto accident claim has been closed successfully; thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
